entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
